episodes.title: Welcome to Cult Talk
episodes.description:
Cults come in many forms, and Amber and Kiersten start unpacking the psychology, manipulation, and media influence behind them. Plus, why society might just be a cult itself. 🧠🔮

🔗 Full video: https://youtu.be/l9FbWffxUdA
